original_text: They shall forget their shame and all the treachery they have practiced against me, when they dwell securely in their land with none to make them afraid,
korean_text: 그들이 그 땅에 평안히 거주하고 두렵게 할 자가 없게 될 때에 부끄러움을 품고 내게 범한 죄를 뉘우치리니

sentences.original_text: and all the treachery they have practiced against me
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나를 향해 행한 모든 배신을

sentences.original_text: when they dwell securely in their land
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 자기 땅에 안전히 거할 때

sentences.original_text: with none to make them afraid
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 두렵게 할 자가 아무도 없을 때
